Name: Kashi Golean Original
Allen's Note: Looks good on paper, has a bit of a Kronenberg monster look to it though?

Name: All Bran
Allen's Note: All Bran is not all bran – the second ingredient is sugar! But it's "a lot bran", so it cleans up

Name: Kashi Golean Toasted Cinnamon Crisp
Allen's Note: Tempted to try this now

Name: Cheerios, Plain
Allen's Note: Really though, who eats plain Cheerios

Name: Nature's Path Optimum Power Cereal Blueberry
Allen's Note: I have a box of this right now, it's pretty okay

Name: Alpen Original
Allen's Note: I made the mistake once of buying this no sugar added Alpen. It was not pleasant

Name: Kashi Organic Cinnamon Harvest Cereal
Allen's Note: Have some of this right now, it's fairly good, they're like less sweet Mini Wheats

Name: Shreddies
Allen's Note: I used to love Shreddies as a kid, after I paved the entire bowl surface with brown sugar. Not advisable

Name: Frosted Mini Wheats
Allen's Note: Mini wheats scored suspiciously well, but it has less sugar than All Bran so 🤷‍♀️

Name: Special K Low Fat Granola
Allen's Note: I added this to show the perils of granola, but it didn't do so poorly

Name: Nature's Path Flax Plus Pumpkin Raisin Crunch
Allen's Note: There are a lot of Nature's Path cereals, and a lot of them are a reasonable balance between candy and food

Name: Nature's Path Vanilla Almond Granola Cereal
Allen's Note: This has the most fat per gram of anything on the list

Name: Corn Flakes
Allen's Note: The most nothing of all cereals, the everycereal, the cereal that is neither good nor bad. It is just Corn Flakes.

Name: Rice Krispies
Allen's Note: Second most nothing of all cereals

Name: Two Scoops Raisin Bran
Allen's Note: Takes a hit for the sugar in the raisins, but holds its own

Name: Vector
Allen's Note: Anything here and below and I'm too tempted to just eat it on a whim. Amusingly, Vector specifies decimals of nutrients because it's a "meal replacement".

Name: Nature's Path Sunrise Crunchy Cinnamon
Allen's Note: Disappointed that this cinnamon one came out so low – it's the tastiest "healthy" cereal I've tried

Name: Honey Bunches of Oats w Almonds
Allen's Note: In Honey Bunches of Oats, oats are ingredient number 4. Sugar is 2.

Name: Corn Squares (fka Corn Bran)
Allen's Note: Not very filling; less healthy than you'd think for a cereal that was called Corn Bran.

Name: Oatmeal Crisp Raisin
Allen's Note: In 2021 they'll be required to break out added sugar from raisin sugar, which might boost this kind of cereal a bit

Name: Honey Nut Cheerios
Allen's Note: Surprisingly bad! This is often cited as the most popular cereal in US and Canada

Name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch
Allen's Note: Whole grain wheat, supposedly

Name: Lucky Charms
Allen's Note: I did not know whole grain corn was a thing. It did not save Lucky Charms

Name: Froot Loops
Allen's Note: Whole grain corn flour is number two – but sugar is literally the first ingredient

Name: Fruity Pebbles
Allen's Note: Not even available in Canada, but it's infamous so I added it

Name: Frosted Flakes
Allen's Note: I don't want to think about how much of this I ate as a teenager

Name: Mega Stuf Oreo O's
Allen's Note: Special thanks to Cabel Sasser for making me aware of this exquisite specimen

Name: Larabar Apple
Allen's Note: The only bar in my test set that plausibly met the threshold for getting -1 point for being 40% or more whole fruit or veg.

Name: Nature Valley Crunchy Peanut Butter
Allen's Note: This is like a classic Nature Valley bar. Thought it'd do better.

Name: Nature Valley Protein Peanut Almond & Dark Chocolate
Allen's Note: An extreme example of protein loaded into something that is otherwise bad for you. Nutri-score says bad bar, do not pass go.

Name: Nature Valley Trail Mix Mixed Berry
Allen's Note: These Trail Mix bars are pretty good for where they rank.

Name: Quaker Dipps Chocolate Chip
Allen's Note: Sweet mother of god.

Name: Quaker Chewy Smore's
Allen's Note: I feel like these must be one of the most common things in kids' lunch boxes?

Name: Kind Healthy Grains, Oats & Honey w Toasted Coconut
Allen's Note: But it says "Healthy Grains"! Saturated fat from the coconut doesn't help.

Name: CLIF White Chocolate Macadamia Nut
Allen's Note: These kind of bars are less bad than others, but at the end of the day processed calorie-dense food is going to be worse than bulkier fresher food.

Name: Kashi Honey Oat Flax
Allen's Note: I kind of like these so I hoped they would have scored even better. But it turns out that dense carb bar is not an ideal food format.

Name: Nutri-Grain Strawberry
Allen's Note: It's healthy because it says 'Nutri'

Name: CLIF KID Z-BAR Iced Oatmeal Cookie
Allen's Note: So they're less bad than some other bars. But roughly equivalent to a pouch of Cinnamon Toast Crunch.

Name: Welch's Fruit Snacks
Allen's Note: It can't be bad for you, it was made from fruit (juice from concentrate)

Name: Made Good Chocolate Drizzled Birthday Cake
Allen's Note: Often the flavor, e.g. birthday cake vs. peanut butter, makes a lot less difference than what brand and format the bar is.

Name: SunRype Fruit to Go Fruit Strips
Allen's Note: Fruit juice from concentrate is not whole fruit, friends!

Name: RXBAR Chocolate Chip
Allen's Note: Nutri-Score disapproves of loading sugary things with protein to compensate.

Name: Oreo Mini Cookies Pouch
Allen's Note: Unlike most of this list, you know what you're getting into with these.

Name: Goldfish Cheddar Crackers Snack Pack
Allen's Note: Expected these to do worse – they're salty cheese crackers. No sugar FTW.

Name: Made Good Granola Minis Strawberry
Allen's Note: Kinda surprised how much fibre these have

Name: Bear Strawberry Fruit Rolls
Allen's Note: These list whole fruit on their ingredients, and have small serving sizes at least.

Name: Think High Protein Bar, Peanut Butter
Allen's Note: Highly processed, yes. Artificial sweeteners, yes. But filling.

Name: Quest Protein Bar, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
Allen's Note: The letter grade really likes this bar because it's not quite dense enough in "bad" nutrients to be penalized for it.

Name: Simply Protein Crispy Bar, Peanut Butter Chocolate
Allen's Note: Not all protein bars score well, but most good-scoring bars are protein bars.

Name: ONE Protein Bar, Maple Glazed Doughnut
Allen's Note: Maybe least healthy-sounding bar that got a reasonable score.

Name: KIND Zero Bar, Caramel Almond & Sea Salt
Allen's Note: Instead of sugar alcohols, KIND Zero uses allulose as its sweetener.

Name: Walmart Great Value Omega-3 Trail Mix Pack
Kirkland Signature Trail Mix Pack w/ M&Ms
Allen's Note: A thoughtful trail mix can be a good snack, but adding candy will put it in the sin bin

Name: Blue Diamond Roasted Salted Almonds, Pack
Allen's Note: It's too calorie-dense to get an A rating, but objectively a pretty good pick.

Name: A Banana
Allen's Note: If only they made these in a foil wrapper

Name: German Nesquik
Allen's Note: Nestle packed this with the precise amount of fibre and protein necessary to get a Nutri-Score A in 2021. In 2022, the algorithm changed to tamp this down.

Name: SimplyProtein Cinnamon Pecan Crispy Bar
Allen's Note: Just barely makes the cutoff for being allowed to count its protein, earning it an A.
